historical_summary: Xavier started his college journey with an interest in computer science, expressing frustration and curiosity about coding. He explored various aspects of technology, particularly blockchain and cryptocurrencies, showing a keen interest in trading and market trends. He was intrigued by figures like Satoshi Nakamoto and began engaging with online communities like Wall Street Bets.

He secured a summer internship in quant finance, which he landed through a connection of his father, showing an early entry into finance. His interest in blockchain technology led him to question and explore its potential impacts on various industries.
upcoming: Trading Internship: Xavier will start his internship at a quant firm, focusing on market making and algorithmic trading. He'll use AI Pair Programming tools to develop and refine trading algorithms, aiming to increase efficiency and reduce errors in his work.

Crypto Research: He will continue to research blockchain technologies, particularly smart contracts, to understand their applications in finance, potentially exploring how they could be integrated into his trading models.
Networking: He plans to attend several crypto meetups and blockchain conferences to expand his professional network, aiming to connect with industry leaders and potential mentors.
